_description: On the Vanity of this World — twelve unrhymed short lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Þe lif of þis worldYs Reuled wiþ
                    wyndWepinge derknesse ad steriyngeWiþ wind we
                    blowenWiþ wind we lassunWiþ weopinge we comenWiþ
                    steringe we byginnenWiþ steringe we endenWiþ drede we
                    dwellenWiþ drede we wenden
